page.title: 03Newspapers in Mansfield.
page.content:
In Mansfield there are three main newspapers. They are the Observer, the Recorder and the Chad. The Chad (or Chronicle Advertiser) costs 20p and I think it is very good value. The Observer and the Recorder are free newspapers. Both of these newspapers depend entirely on the money they earn from their advertisers.
All of the papers carry very similiar sorts of advertising, mainly for motor cars, property, services and local entertainmement. They also have local news (much more in the Chad than the others), TV program guides, womens pages and sports coverage.
